title: How to Download Images from a Google Doc

steps.title: Open the Google doc where the desired image is located in.
steps.content: Open the Google doc where the desired image is located in.

steps.title: Right-click the image that you want to download.
steps.content: Right-click the image that you want to download.

steps.title: Click "view more actions" then click "save to keep".
steps.content: Click "view more actions" then click "save to keep".

steps.title: After the menu on the right loads, click the picture and then "done".
steps.content: After the menu on the right loads, click the picture and then "done".

steps.title: Open a new tab an the go to Google Keep.
steps.content: Open a new tab an the go to Google Keep . Right click the image and select "save image as".

steps.title: Name your file the desired name.
steps.content: Name your file the desired name.
